statements: SELECT * FROM sleep_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, date, sleep_quality FROM sleep_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT sleep_end_time, sleep_start_time, sleep_quality FROM sleep_data WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT date, recommended_improvements FROM sleep_data WHERE sleep_quality > 3;
SELECT user_id, date, recommended_improvements FROM sleep_data WHERE recommended_improvements IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, date, sleep_quality FROM sleep_data WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM sleep_data WHERE sleep_quality > 8 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT user_id, sleep_start_time, sleep_end_time FROM sleep_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-07-01' AND '2021-07-31' ORDER BY sleep_start_time DESC
SELECT user_id, sleep_quality, recommended_improvements FROM sleep_data WHERE recommended_improvements IS NOT NULL
SELECT user_id, date, sleep_start_time, sleep_end_time, sleep_quality, recommended_improvements FROM sleep_data WHERE date > '2021-08-15'
SELECT * FROM sleep_data;
SELECT user_id, sleep_duration FROM sleep_data WHERE sleep_quality > 3;
SELECT user_id, bedtime_time, wakeup_time FROM sleep_data ORDER BY bedtime_time DESC;
SELECT recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT user_id, sleep_duration, sleep_quality FROM sleep_data WHERE sleep_duration > 7 AND sleep_quality > 2 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, sleep_duration, sleep_quality, bedtime_time, wakeup_time FROM sleep_data WHERE sleep_duration > 7
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, sleep_duration, sleep_quality FROM sleep_data ORDER BY sleep_duration DESC
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, bedtime_time, wakeup_time FROM sleep_data WHERE sleep_quality < 4
SELECT * FROM SleepData WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT sleep_start, sleep_end FROM SleepData WHERE sleep_quality > 50;
SELECT user_id, sleep_quality FROM SleepData WHERE sleep_quality BETWEEN 30 AND 70;
SELECT * FROM WearableDevices WHERE device_type = 'Fitbit' ORDER BY last_sync DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM SleepRecommendations WHERE recommendation_status = 'pending';
SELECT user_id, sleep_start, sleep_end FROM SleepData WHERE sleep_quality > 5 ORDER BY sleep_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM WearableDevices WHERE device_type='Fitbit' AND manufacturer='Apple' ORDER BY last_sync ASC;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM SleepRecommendations WHERE recommendation_status='pending' ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, sleep_start, sleep_end, sleep_quality FROM SleepData JOIN SleepRecommendations ON SleepData.user_id = SleepRecommendations.user_id ORDER BY sleep_quality DESC;

SELECT user_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_status FROM SleepRecommendations LEFT JOIN WearableDevices ON SleepRecommendations.user_id = WearableDevices.user_id WHERE device_type='Fitbit' ORDER BY recommendation_status ASC, last_sync DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_data;
SELECT user_id, sleep_duration, light_sleep_duration FROM user_data ORDER BY sleep_duration DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM wearable_devices WHERE device_name = 'Fitbit';
SELECT user_id, quality_rating FROM sleep_quality WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM sleep_recommendations WHERE recommendation_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_data;
SELECT user_id, sleep_duration, deep_sleep_duration FROM user_data ORDER BY sleep_duration DESC;
SELECT user_id, date, quality_rating FROM sleep_quality WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT device_id, device_name, user_id FROM wearable_devices WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, recommendation_text FROM sleep_recommendations ORDER BY user_id ASC, recommendation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sleep_patterns ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT duration_minutes FROM light_sleep WHERE user_id = 123 AND date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT user_id, duration_minutes FROM deep_sleep WHERE duration_minutes > 60;
SELECT * FROM sleep_quality WHERE quality_score >= 8 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT user_id, date, recommendation FROM sleep_recommendations WHERE user_id = 456 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, date, duration_minutes FROM sleep_patterns ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM deep_sleep WHERE duration_minutes > 120 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT user_id, date, quality_score FROM sleep_quality WHERE quality_score >= 80 AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-28';
SELECT user_id, date, recommendation FROM sleep_recommendations WHERE recommendation LIKE '%relax%' ORDER BY user_id ASC, date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, date, duration_minutes FROM light_sleep WHERE date IN ('2021-03-15', '2021-03-22', '2021-03-29') ORDER BY user_id, date DESC;
